aircraft.value: Phantom Stealth - AC-1647-637 at Sector East Station

defect_observed.value: Oil consumption rate increase. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 09/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 10/02/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 11/02/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 12/02/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 15/02/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

Part - III: (Defect Details)

a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
